scripts.predev: if not exist public\ (mkdir public\) && copy ..\..\build\oss-experimental\react\umd\react.development.js public\ && copy ..\..\build\oss-experimental\react-dom\umd\react-dom.development.js public\ && copy ..\..\build\oss-experimental\react-dom\umd\react-dom-server-legacy.browser.development.js public\
scripts.start: react-scripts build && set NODE_ENV=production&& node server
